data.comment: The match is underway at Matmut Atlantique.
Bastein Dechepy awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Bordeaux.
In the minute 6, Bastein Dechepy awards Nimes a goal kick.
Nimes to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Free kick Bordeaux.
In the minute 8, Bordeaux's Toma Basic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Nimes at Matmut Atlantique.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 11, Nimes have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
Nimes's Kevin Denkey goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Nimes.
Paul Baysse's header is off-target for Bordeaux.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bordeaux.
In the minute 14, Bastein Dechepy signals a Nimes throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
In the minute 17, Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 20, Bastein Dechepy waits before resuming play because Renaud Ripart for Nimes is still down.
Nimes’s Renaud Ripart is on his feet again at Matmut Atlantique.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Can Bordeaux capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nimes's half?
Lamine Fomba for Nimes drives towards goal at Matmut Atlantique. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Bordeaux to check on Florian Miguel, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Bordeaux Nimes's Kevin Denkey is caught offside.
Nimes's Florian Miguel is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 30, Throw-in Nimes.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 33, Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Patrick Burner of Nimes gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Can Nimes capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Otavio is booked for the home team.
In the minute 38, Niclas Eliasson for Nimes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bordeaux.
Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Nimes.
The home team have replaced Otavio with Yacine Adli. This is the first substitution made today by Jean-Louis Gasset.
Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 41, Bordeaux make their second substitution with Remi Oudin replacing Nicolas De Preville.
Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 43, Baptiste Reynet is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Josh Maja (Bordeaux) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Baptiste Reynet returns to the field for Nimes after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 45, In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hatem Ben Arfa of Bordeaux smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The 1st half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Bastein Dechepy signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Nimes's half.
Bastein Dechepy awards the away team a throw-in.
Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Bordeaux just outside Nimes's area.
In the minute 45, Pablo Castro (Bordeaux) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
In the minute 45, Bordeaux's Remi Oudin gets in a shot on goal at Matmut Atlantique. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
The first-half has come to a close in Bordeaux.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Anthony Briancon for Nimes has been booked by Bastein Dechepy and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 47, Bastein Dechepy signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Nimes's half.
Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Bordeaux.
Attention is being given to Bordeaux’s Hwang Ui-Jo and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 51, In Bordeaux Bordeaux attack through Toma Basic. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Nimes at Matmut Atlantique.
Throw-in for Nimes at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 52, Hwang Ui-Jo has recovered and rejoins the match in Bordeaux.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
In the minute 53, Josh Maja (Bordeaux) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Nimes have a goal kick.
Nimes have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Bordeaux.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Bordeaux.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
In the minute 59, Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
Bordeaux's Toma Basic misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 60, Bastein Dechepy awards Nimes a goal kick.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Hatem Ben Arfa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bordeaux.
In the minute 62, Hatem Ben Arfa (Bordeaux) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
The away team replace Kevin Denkey with Karim Aribi.
In the minute 65, Gaetan Paquiez is replacing Matteo Ahlinvi for the away team.
Jean-Louis Gasset (Bordeaux) is making a third substitution, with Jimmy Briand replacing Hwang Ui-Jo.
Mehdi Zerkane is on a sub for Josh Maja for Bordeaux.
In the minute 66, Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Nimes.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Bordeaux.
In the minute 67, Lamine Fomba gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nimes.
Corner awarded to Nimes.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
At Matmut Atlantique, Jimmy Briand has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 71, Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Nimes.
Nimes to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nimes in Bordeaux.
Bastein Dechepy awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 75, Bastein Dechepy signals a throw-in for Bordeaux, close to Nimes's area.
In Bordeaux, Bordeaux push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Nimes close to the penalty box.
In the minute 77, In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bordeaux needs to be cautious. Nimes have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 78, Penalty! Bastein Dechepy points to the spot, great chance for Bordeaux...
Florian Miguel (Nimes) has received a first yellow card.
Baptiste Reynet (Nimes) gets a yellow card.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Jimmy Briand.
In the minute 82, Goal! Remi Oudin extends Bordeaux's lead to 2-0.
Great play from Jimmy Briand to set up the goal.
Jerome Arpinon is making the team's third substitution at Matmut Atlantique with Yassine Benrahou replacing Lamine Fomba.
In the minute 83, Amadou Traore is replacing Hatem Ben Arfa for the home team.
At Matmut Atlantique, Bordeaux are penalized for being offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 87, Bastein Dechepy signals a Nimes throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Free kick Bordeaux.
Moussa Kone is replacing Renaud Ripart for Nimes at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 89, Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Bastein Dechepy will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Loris Benito's header is off-target for Bordeaux.
Bastein Dechepy awards Nimes a goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Bordeaux.
Throw-in for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
Bastein Dechepy signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Nimes's half.
Throw-in Nimes.
Important block from the Nimes defence as Mehdi Zerkane fires in a strike for Bordeaux.
Bordeaux's Mehdi Zerkane gets in a shot on goal at Matmut Atlantique. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
Nimes's Karim Aribi breaks free at Matmut Atlantique. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Bastein Dechepy blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
